Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Manchester in 1980...
Injured on 6/8/1980 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/12/1981 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/24/1981 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/30/1981 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/21/1983, off Art Sinclair (PIT)...
Earned first career win on 7/11/1983...
Hit first career homerun on 9/22/1984, off Patrick Peltier (TOL)...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/11/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $500,200 per year...
Injured on 5/14/1989 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/8/1989 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 4/21/1991 to a minor league contract...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 3/1/1992 to a minor league contract.
